notesStmt.note: First two lines, biblical citations, denoted by a bar above each letter; A fragment from the upper part of the center of a Ketubah document, given by Abraham ben Ṣedaka to the daughter of Pinḥas ben Levi the Elder. Abraham is a signed as a witness on a bill of appointment issuedḅy the Erets Israeli Gaonate in 1065 (Cambridge T-S 10J 26 fol. 1/ Oxford Bodleian Heb. d.66 fol. 4, in Gil, Erets Israel, 1983 vol. IIIp. 26); The date (l. 3) is in the month of Shevat, in the sixth year of the sabbatical cycle, which could be either 1062 or 1069. In l. 4 is the allusion to Ramle: באחסנת ב]ני יהודה].
Condition: fragment (center area), torn, faded; verso is blank.
